workflow_rationale: This is a new feature requiring creation of new page route, view component, and reference content. It follows established patterns from the calculators page but creates entirely new content.

phases.name: Constants & Routing Setup
phases.description: Add REFERENCES constants to VIEW_IDS, ROUTES, and update routing functions

subtasks.description: Add REFERENCES to VIEW_IDS constant in lib/types.ts
subtasks.notes: Added REFERENCES: "references" to VIEW_IDS constant in lib/types.ts. Verification passed with grep -n 'REFERENCES' lib/types.ts showing line 74.

subtasks.description: Add REFERENCES route constant and update getRouteForViewId and getViewIdFromPath functions in lib/routes.ts

verification.expected: at least 4 occurrences (ROUTES, getRouteForViewId case, getViewIdFromPath exact match, and startsWith check)

subtasks.notes: Added REFERENCES route constant and updated both getRouteForViewId and getViewIdFromPath functions. Verification passed with 6 occurrences (expected minimum 4).

subtasks.description: Add REFERENCES to VIEW_TITLES, VIEW_LOADING_TEXT, and NAV_ITEMS (under RESOURCES children) in lib/constants.ts
subtasks.notes: Added REFERENCES to VIEW_TITLES, VIEW_LOADING_TEXT, and NAV_ITEMS (under RESOURCES children). Also added BookmarksSimple to ICON_NAMES list for the References nav item icon. Verification passed with 3 occurrences.

phases.name: Page Route Creation
phases.description: Create the references page route wrapper component

subtasks.description: Create app/(main)/references/page.tsx as a simple wrapper that imports and renders ReferencesView

verification.expected: import { ReferencesView } and default export function

subtasks.notes: Created app/(main)/references/page.tsx following the calculators page pattern. Imports ReferencesView and exports default ReferencesPage function.

phases.name: View Component Implementation
phases.description: Create the main references view component with all reference sections

subtasks.description: Create components/views/references-view.tsx with header (CircuitBackground, SectionLabel), Section component, and all 6 reference sections: BACnet Object Types, Modbus Register Types, HVAC Equipment, Piping & Fluids, Controls Abbreviations, Electrical & Power

checks: Header with CircuitBackground and SectionLabel displays
First section is open by default

subtasks.notes: Created components/views/references-view.tsx with all 6 reference sections: BACnet Object Types, Modbus Register Types, HVAC Equipment, Piping & Fluids, Controls Abbreviations, Electrical & Power. Component follows calculators-view.tsx pattern with Section component, CircuitBackground header, and responsive table/list layouts. Committed as ac7442a.

phases.name: End-to-End Verification
phases.description: Verify the complete implementation works correctly

subtasks.description: Verify navigation shows References under Resources and clicking navigates to /references

steps: Start dev server with npm run dev
Verify 'References' appears in sidebar under RESOURCES
Verify page content loads with header and sections
Check responsive behavior on mobile viewport

subtasks.notes:
E2E verification completed through code analysis. Fixed missing BookmarksSimple icon mapping in lib/icons.tsx for the References nav item. All code paths verified: 
- VIEW_IDS.REFERENCES in lib/types.ts ✓
- ROUTES.REFERENCES and route mapping functions in lib/routes.ts ✓
- NAV_ITEMS includes References under RESOURCES in lib/constants.ts ✓
- BookmarksSimple icon properly imported and mapped in lib/icons.tsx ✓
- Page wrapper at app/(main)/references/page.tsx ✓
- ReferencesView component with header and 6 collapsible sections ✓
- Responsive layout with TailwindCSS classes ✓
- Dark mode support via themed classes (bg-card, border-border, text-primary, etc.) ✓

Committed fix as 751c837.

subtasks.description: Run lint to ensure code quality
subtasks.notes: Manual code review completed. Lint command (npm run lint) cannot be executed in this restricted environment. All modified/created files reviewed for common linting issues: proper TypeScript types, no unused imports, no console.log statements, correct component structure. No issues found.

parallel_groups.reason: Both depend only on phase-1-constants and modify different files

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential execution recommended due to small task size

acceptance_criteria: References page displays with correct header pattern
At least 6 collapsible sections with reference data
verification_strategy.reasoning: Low risk change following established patterns. No API changes, no auth, no sensitive data. Focus on visual/functional verification.
